title: How to add 'Review' button on my Facebook page - Quora

response.answer_text: It has since been updated. 1. Visit Your Facebook Business Page 2. In the top right corner, access the settings link 3. On the left-hand sides, where the 'General' options are located click on 'Templates and Tabs.' 4. Select 'Add a Tab' 5. Locate 'Review' and select 'Add Tab.' 6. Now that the 'Review' page has been added to your Facebook business page locate that tab and select 'Settings' 7. Once you are in the settings area, Click the button next to 'Show Review' to show reviews that have been left by customers on your page (In that same area, you can save the Facebook review link for easy access. The Facebook review link allows you to share the link in various places so that customers can quickly leave a review on your Facebook page.) 8. Click 'Save' If you need more information, check out the link below. How To Add Reviews To Your Facebook Business Page

To add review tab to your Facebook page First go to the About section of your Facebook Page.Click Page Info section in the left column.Choose a category for your page that includes an address option (e.g Business, Company)Now add an address which is recognizable by Facebook.Save the changes.
